content: AI with IBM watsonx.ai d. Click New project +, as shown in Figure 4-3. Figure 4-3 New project+ menu e. Enter the project name and, if applicable, upload local files. Click Create, as shown in Figure 4-4. Figure 4-4 Create menu 3. Provision watsonx.ai Studio: a. Log in to https://cloud.ibm.com/. b. To add services from the catalog, use the search box that is shown in Figure 4-5. Figure 4-5 watsonx.ai utilities search box c. Enter “watsonx.ai Studio” and choose the studio from the catalog, as shown in Figure 4-6. Figure 4-6 wastonx.ai utilities list d. Select a pricing plan (Lite or Professional), and then click Create. Figure 4-7 watsonx.ai pricing plan selection 4. Generate a watsonx.ai API key: a. Go to https://cloud.ibm.com/iam/apikeys. b. Click Create, as shown in Figure 4-8. Figure 4-8 Create API key menu option Chapter 4. Building and using artificial intelligence models 31 c. Enter the relevant information, and then click Create, as shown in Figure 4-9.
